title: Employee Training: Johnson Tractor 2012 Dealership of the Year

subtasks: Research and stay updated on machinery advancements.
Invest time and resources in training programs.
Facilitate attendance at industry conferences for salespeople.
Certify technicians through service level progression.
Collaborate with manufacturers for tracking technician certification.
Operate in a small community in the Pacific Northwest.
Maintain a 30-year history in the equipment dealer market.
Uphold principles of excellence and honesty in customer service.
